TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadDataCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadDataCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type UploadDataCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * UploadDataCompletedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Um que contém dados de evento.

summary.span: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando você cria um delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado ao evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratando e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o carregamento de forma assíncrona de dados.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading data. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#34)] O seguinte método é chamado quando o carregamento for concluído.The following method is called when the upload completes.
